remarks: Rearrange join of atoms in an equality.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jul-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hlatexch4.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlatexch4.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlatexch3N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( Q =/= R /\ ( P .\/ Q ) = ( P .\/ R ) ) ) -> ( P .\/ Q ) = ( Q .\/ R ) ) $.
